name: Cerium oxalicum
Relationship: Compare: Ingluvin - (made from gizzard of a fowl). Vomiting of pregnancy; gastric neurasthenia. Infantile vomiting and diarrhoea. 3x trit. Amygdale.; Lactic-ac.; Ipecac.
details: Spasmodic reflex vomiting and spasmodic cough are within the sphere of this remedy. VOMITING OF PREGNANCY; and of half-digested food. Whooping cough, with vomiting and hemorrhage. Dysmenorrhoea in fleshy, robust women. Better when flow is established.
